name: Smash the Plumber
description:
There is this guy who wants to enter your castle. Why? That's not important, just stop him! Your are the only one capable on this, that's everything you need to know.

Your allies may be useless, but they still are your allies... so try to spare their lives if you can.

Attack with the space bar.

PS: This is the third game of my "release a game every month in 2022" challenge. It's a little bit trashy, but I hope you like :) 

If you want to support this challenge, feel free to click the donate button above, recommend this game or be one of my first Patrons. Thanks :)

January game: A Warehouse Story

February game: Curse of the Blob King
